meanings.sent1: The consensual decision was made by both of us.
meanings.sent2: The consensual agreement was reached after a discussion.
meanings.sent3: The consensual choice to share dessert made us both happy.
meanings.sent4: Their consensual effort to finish the project together was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The consensual handshake sealed the deal between the two friends.

meanings.definition: Based on or involving consent or mutual agreement.
meanings.sent1: The consensual relationship between the two parties was strong.
meanings.sent2: A consensual decision was made after careful consideration.
meanings.sent3: The consensual plan to meet at the park was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: Their consensual effort to organize the event was successful.
meanings.sent5: The consensual agreement brought peace and harmony to the group.
